name: Midasr
body:
Midasr is R package dedicated to estimate restricted MIDAS regression and test whether the restriction conforms to data. The package is developed by [Virmantas Kvedaras](http://www.vk.ten.lt/) and [Vaidotas Zemlys](http://vzemlys.wordpress.com).

The best way to install package, currently is by using the following code in R:

```
library(devtools)
install_github("midasr","mpiktas")
```
Or you can install the particular version using the following code:

```
library(devtools)
install_github("midasr","mpiktas","v0.0.4")
```

When the code matures the package will be available from [CRAN](http://cran.r-project.org).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
